reuters.title: BROWN-FORMAN <BFD> FILES 200 MLN DLR DEBT OFFER
reuters.body: Brown-Forman Corp said it filed a shelf registration covering up to 200 mln dlrs of debt securities guaranteed by its parent company, Brown-Forman Inc. Proceeds will be used to retire commercial paper, to repay some long-term debt and for general corporate purposes. Reuter 
